name: Spark High School Pathways
description: Spark guides 8th grade students and their families through the high school selection process to help them find the right path to success in 9th grade and beyond. After successfully navigating the high school application process, 9th graders are supported through a texting platform and messaging campaign to help them stay on track.

address: 25 Taylor Street, Suite 648, San Francisco, CA, 94102
